S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-438 (partial) Consistwnt handling of binary streams for updateXXX, namely check the length correctly if it is greater than the 2Gb supported by Derby. Add some comments to SQLBinary to clarify the format. Save the length when reading a binary stream from the store into an application, will be used in a subsequent checkin. Ensure eof handling when reading the binary value length in the on-disk format is handled correctly.
